doc.description: 2013-01-01 The customer has reported that the scm12 control module is making an unusual louder than normal noise from the control module. The customer has suggested it sounds like a motor grinding. The customer has reported that the breat biopsies have been completed. There have been no patient consequences reported. Device was returned to manufacturer 2013-04-23 MedWatch Adverse Event Id. 948837
2013-01-01 Patient presented with inappropriate icd shocks due to lead fracture and noise on right ventricular icd lead. MedWatch Adverse Event Id. 951162

2013-01-01 Sudden fracture of 1400 lead leading to noise in icd lead and inappropriate icd shocks - lead impedance on arrival with noise on lead was 44052. Overnite noise on lead created sensing issues with pacing and had to turn off rv pacing - lead impedance increase 2 low - 200 er. Lead revised in 2007. MedWatch Adverse Event Id. 960737
